data.rationale:
I bounced ideas with Damian Conway about the naming of this module.
    The name is actually his suggestion. I pored over the current
    rootlevel namespaces and couldn't find one that fit closely at all.

    This is not actually a very new idea--it's used in cfengine, and
    Dijkstra discussed it in 1975 (as Damian pointed out to me). But I
    don't know of anything else--certainly no Perl module--that
    implements these "deterministic, verifying, rectifying guarded
    commands" (as Damian put it) in a general way.
